original_title: Rabbit Hash (The Center of the Universe)
overview: The quirky TRUE story of a small American town that actually elected a DOG as it's Mayor! Rabbit Hash - Center of the Universe answers the question: What kind of people in what kind of town in American would actually elect a four legged canine to run their city? And it turns out that the answers are hilariously all American.
title: Rabbit Hash (The Center of the Universe)
